pages.text: These spectres are called and bound by your will to the point where their own Ice Bouquets do not touch either you or your allies.
One can call these creatures through the use of a $(l:focuses/necromancy/spooky_focus)Spooky Focus$(), or through a ritual which summons one without a limited lifespan.
Wraiths can be healed by right-clicking on them with Ectoplasm.
A variant of the wraith, these ice puking creatures are called when summoned within a $(l:world/crypts)Crypt$().
